medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant for 2 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started diffusely and has since localized to the right lower quadrant over 2 days. Patient has been febrile with no vomiting or diarrhea. Endorses anorexia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension and biventricular cardiomyopathy.
medical_history.family_history: History of hypertension, diabetes, and heart disease in family. Mother has high blood pressure and migraines; father has diabetes and heart problems. One sister died of a heart attack during pregnancy while living in a different location. It is thought that his father and sister have the same heart problem.
